Title: Oman LNG issues tender to sell one April LNG cargo
Description: Oman LNG has issued a tender to sell one cargo for delivery in April from its 10.9 mtpa Qalhat LNG export facility through a tender that closes tomorrow.
Author: CK

Title: Kogas seeks more February-March LNG cargoes
Description: Koreaâ€™s state-owned Kogas is seeking an unspecified number of cargoes for delivery across Feb. 20 to Mar. 10 to its LNG receiving terminals in Korea through a tender closing on Feb. 16. The tender comes swiftly after Kogas closed an earlier tender to buy an unspecified number of cargoes across the same delivery dates.
Author: CK

Title: Loading still underway at Calcasieu Pass following export approval for LNG commissioning cargoes
Description: Loading of the first LNG commissioning cargo at the Venture Global-operated 10 mtpa Calcasieu Pass LNG terminal in the US is still underway, following  export approval from the energy regulator
Author: CK
